item.title: Comment on Can we expect large federal workforce cuts? by (Not That) Bill O'Reilly
item.description:
Maybe bettors have finally read the fine print and realized that the definitive data source for this market indicates there are only ~3 million federal civilian employees to cut from? The 23.4M figure cited includes state and local employees the President has no direct ability to cut.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/can-we-expect-large-federal-workforce-cuts.html?commentID=160839664

item.title: Comment on More Randian villains by Moral Panic
item.description:
Reply to Tom T.:

The credit is only for those struggling upstarts like Ford and Honda, I guess.

Maybe you can qualify if you rode the high-speed rail to Merced and bought the Tesla there. Someday.
